snippet: An anti-immigration party in Norway’s coalition government headed for its worst election result in 22 years in a local vote on Monday.
abstract: Norway's anti-immigration Progress Party loses local election to Labour Party, which supports plan to accept Syrian refugees; failed bid to make vote a referendum on immigration erodes right-wing party's previous gains.
lead_paragraph: An anti-immigration party in Norway’s coalition government headed for its worst election result in 22 years in a local vote on Monday.

headline.main: Norway: Voters Deliver Blow to Party Opposed to Accepting Syrian Refugees
headline.print_headline: Europe; Norway: Voters Deliver Blow to Party Opposed to Accepting Syrian Refugees

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
